articles.description: With sub-4.4-second 40 times and smooth pass-catching workouts, Chris Olave and Garrett Wilson solidified themselves as first-round picks at the NFL Scouting Combine.
articles.content:

articles.title: Serena Williams speaks out after The New York Times publishes an article about her with a photo of her sister Venus - CBS News
articles.description: "You can do better, @nytimes," Serena wrote Wednesday.
articles.content:
Tennis star Serena Williams is speaking out after The New York Times published an article about her but mistakenly used a photo of her sister, Venus Williams. The Times has since apologized.
